page.title: 15APPLETON ROEBUCK VILLAGE 1
page.content: {Population}640,the largest settlement, a typical village of the York area, formerly agricultural with associated small industries,now largely resi- dential,middle income,managerial & professional people.A long street village with small cul-de-sacs & side streets,there is a green at the N.& a smaller one by the P.O. {Houses}are mainly modern but there are still many Victorian and earlier ones.Older housese front Main St.There are Council houses in West End Ave. Most houses are equipped with modern conveniences,& all the older houses have been improved.All main services are connected except gas though some use Calor gas deliveries.Most have oil -fired central heating and also have coal fires.Many houses have double glazing.Most have at least 1 garage. There's a small caravan site at the N.
